title: Flight card
data:
{{Obsolete}} The Flight card does one of the following: * Level 0: Casts either [[Spider Form]] or [[Bat Form]] on the player. * Level 1: Casts [[Flight (spell)|Flight]] ''and'' [[Swiftness]] on the player. * Level 2: Casts [[Flight (spell)|Flight]] ''and'' [[Swiftness]] on the player, and places a shaft in the player's square if possible.
